org.gerstner.oauth2android.response
Class JsonParser

java.lang.Object
  org.gerstner.oauth2android.response.JsonParser

public class JsonParser
extends java.lang.Object

If the client received an "application/JSON" answer, this class contains the appropriate methods to analyse the JSONObject and search for specific indicators e.g. the access token or an error

Author:
Christoph Gerstner
See Also:
#parseForErrors(org.json.JSONObject), #parseForAccessToken(org.json.JSONObject, org.gerstner.oauth2android.token.TokenTypeDefinition), #parseForRefreshToken(org.json.JSONObject)

Method Detail

parseForErrors

public static void parseForErrors(JSONObject jsonObject)
                           throws JSONException,
                                  InvalidRequestException,
                                  InvalidClientException,
                                  InvalidGrantException,
                                  UnauthorizedClientException,
                                  UnsupportedGrantTypeException,
                                  InvalidScopeException,
                                  OAuthException
Goes through the JSONObject and looks for error codes. If an error was found the corresponding exception will be created. If the server included a more detailed error description or a url leading to an error webpage the method will include the description or the url into the OAuthException

Parameters:
jsonObject -
Throws:
JSONException
InvalidRequestException
InvalidClientException
InvalidGrantException
UnauthorizedClientException
UnsupportedGrantTypeException
InvalidScopeException
OAuthException

parseForAccessToken

public static Token parseForAccessToken(JSONObject jsonObject,
                                        TokenTypeDefinition tokenTypeDefinition)
                                 throws InvalidTokenTypeException
Parses the Json retrieved from the Response and searches it for patterns, as for example "access_token" or in the tokenTypeDefinition predefined token attributes. If an access token was found in the resonse, this method will determin the type of the token and wich additional token attributes were used.
If no or an empty tokenTypeDefinition was defined, this method determines the token type by the given parameters from the JSON object. Two types can automatically be detected:
BearerToken, MACToken

Parameters:
jsonObject -
tokenTypeDefinition -
Returns:
the access token if found, or null otherwise
Throws:
InvalidTokenTypeException

parseForRefreshToken

public static Token parseForRefreshToken(JSONObject jsonObject)
Parses the JSONObject for the refresh token and returns it, if no refresh token was found null is returned.

Parameters:
jsonObject - JSONObject that was included in the response
Returns:
a token containing the refresh token if one was issued, null otherwise
